oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector

Class InputDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.SimpleInputDataSet
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.FileInputDataSet
        • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.SpatialIndexInputDataSet
          • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.InputDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationStorable, AbstractInputDataSet, IODataSet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistributedDataSet

    public class InputDataSet
extends SpatialIndexInputDataSet
    Contains information of a data set which is the input of a job. A data set is located in one or more paths and can be read using an input format. Additionally, a RecordInfoProvider class should be set to extract the spatial information from the data set records.
    Author:
    hsaucedo
